      static <S,D,T> BindingOption<S,D,T> mapWhen(Supplier<Boolean> condition)

      static <S,D,T> BindingOption<S,D,T> withNullSubstitution(T nullSubstitution)

    • Method Detail

      • mapWhen

        public static <S,D,T> BindingOption<S,D,T> mapWhen(Supplier<Boolean> condition)
        Property mapping will be performed if condition will return true. This option is evaluated first and when evaluates to false no other options are evaluated.
        Type Parameters:
        S - source object type.
        D - destination object type.
        T - destination member type.
        Parameters:
        condition - mapping condition lambda.
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)

      • withNullSubstitution

        public static <S,D,T> BindingOption<S,D,T> withNullSubstitution(T nullSubstitution)
        If source value getter will return null then null value will be substituted with result from nullSubstitution lambda.
        Type Parameters:
        S - source object type.
        D - destination object type.
        T - destination member type.
        Parameters:
        nullSubstitution - null substitution value.
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)
